Assassin Shadow.name: Assassin Shadow
Assassin Shadow.flavor: As you strike, shadows congeal into a solid figure at your foe’s flank. The silhouette looks like you, only its features are shrouded in blackness, and its sword is made of inky gloom.
Assassin Shadow.effect: You conjure a shadowy manifestation of yourself. This conjuration can appear in any square adjacent to the target. This creature can be used to set up a flanking position and can make opportunity attacks (as though you were making the attacks), but it can take no other actions. The manifestation disappears at the end of your next turn.

Concealing Umbra.name: Concealing Umbra
Concealing Umbra.flavor: You exert your will over the stuff of shadow and conceal an ally in pure darkness. No light reveals your friend now.
Concealing Umbra.effect: The target becomes invisible until he or she attacks, or until the end of your next turn.

Shadowed Psyche.name: Shadowed Psyche
Shadowed Psyche.flavor: You veil your enemy’s senses in shadowy phantasms. Your foe strikes at imaginary opponents and moves as a puppet on your strings.
Shadowed Psyche.onHit: At the start of its next turn, the target is dominated by you until the start of its following turn. You cannot cause it to take any action that will obviously harm it (such as walking off a cliff or into a trap the creature is aware of ). You must be within line of sight of the creature at the start of its turn or you can’t dominate it.
